NBA STANDINGS 2021/2022 SEASON

The NBA playoffs is the postseason tournament of the National Basketball Association (NBA) held to determine the league's champion.An annual best-of-seven elimination tournament,the NBA playoffs are held after the league's regular season and its preliminary postseason tournament, the NBA Play-In Tournament.This is the best about the NBA.The information used to create the tables can be found by going to the following website,that is truly amazing and mind-blowing and truly a must go for fans:HERE!
